message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
I understand your position, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I'll consider your offer, Alice, but I can't go above $95 for the product.
